actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to repeal the special minimum wage rate under that act for agricultural employees.

summary.text: Repeals the special minimum wage rate for agricultural employees under the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938. (Repeals 29 U.S.C. 206(a)(5).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to repeal the special minimum wage rate under that act for agricultural employees.
